headline: Exclusive-Blackstone emerges as frontrunner to buy Enverus, sources say
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Blackstone Inc has emerged as the frontrunner to buy energy-focused data provider Enverus for around $6 billion, according to sources familiar with the matter.  Reuters reported in May that Hellman & Friedman was looking to sell Texas-based Enverus.  Blackstone recently returned to the process after dropping out earlier this month, three of the sources said.

headline: KKR Q2 Earnings Surpass Estimates as AUM Rises Y/Y, Stock Gains
summary: KKR's Q2 earnings beat estimates as AUM hits $686B and fee-related earnings rise 17.4%, lifting the stock in the pre-market trading.

headline: Higher Expenses to Hurt Apollo's Q2 Earnings, AUM Growth to Aid
summary: APO's expenses are expected to have risen in Q2, but growing AUM and higher management fees could lift earnings and revenues.
